column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Lavender Latte - really unique latte that I was not sure I would like
column2: given that I wasn't sure how lavender and espresso paired together. It turns out that they mesh just fine
column3: and the floral undertones of the lavender helps counter out some of the bitterness of the espresso. The vanilla latte is fantastic
column5: if you're in the mood for something more traditional.
